value_stack::push_bool

Push a bool onto the stack.

Synopsis 
void
push_bool(
    bool b);
Description

This function pushes a boolean value onto the stack.

Exception Safety

Basic guarantee. Calls to memory_resource::allocate may throw.

Parameters

Name

Description

b

The boolean to insert.
